title: am 24.2 DJ Sona Skin ?! Kommt mit auf denn Hype Train

embed.description: There are no brakes aboard the hype train! So what is this and why did I make it? Well by now you've hopefully heard of the rumours surrounding a Spy vs Engineer update. I was going to make a video of something stupid regarding that, when suddenly I had an End of the Line Community Crate drop for me whilst failing at MVM.

body:
Auf gehts?! Es ist wie Weihnachten!


und das ist mein erster post in diesen .... "neuen" Forum .... zzz... what ever.

cool das man Videos mit einbinden kann.
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/02/red-post-collection-lyte-on-tribunal.html
